In England, in the seven days to 15 March, there were 32,689 new confirmed cases (58.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 08 March, there were 33,462 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 2% (773 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 20 March is 3,754,821 (6,670.9 cases per 100,000 population).
